item.title: Icey-blade done --released--
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

i love it. but take the shine out or make it lighter and on both the dark and lighter part. like REALLY light so it doesnt blend in and look like a mesh mat-ing error. also, shape the blade a bit and maybe make it sorta transoarent, seeing as ice is a transparent/translucent solid. (Change the Alpha from 1.00 to around 0.55-0.65)
